title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for: (-7, -3)

1 point is earned for (2, 3) U (3, 5)

f''(x) exists and f' is decreasing on the intervals

(-7, -3), (2, 3), and (3, 5)
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for: (-7, -3)

1 point is earned for (2, 3) U (3, 5)

f''(x) exists and f' is decreasing on the intervals

(-7, -3), (2, 3), and (3, 5)

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for: (-7, -3)

1 point is earned for (2, 3) U (3, 5)

f''(x) exists and f' is decreasing on the intervals

(-7, -3), (2, 3), and (3, 5)

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for: (-7, -3)

1 point is earned for (2, 3) U (3, 5)

f''(x) exists and f' is decreasing on the intervals

(-7, -3), (2, 3), and (3, 5)
